Replying to @_phzn 2020-09-16 16:01
@_phzn @kentcdodds Netlify Analytics measures requests to assets. Netlify redirects operate out at the edge of the CDN. That makes them incredibly fast, but also doesn't hit an asset for the analytics. You could add a function into the mix for this, I bet.
